Class InstructorHomePage

java.lang.Object
application.InstructorHomePage
public class InstructorHomePage extends Object
InstructorHomePage class represents the user interface for the instructor user. This page displays the main dashboard for instructor interactions, including navigation to QandA sections, direct messages, and student reviewer management.

  • Method Details

    • show

      public void show(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, DatabaseHelper databaseHelper, User user)
      Displays the instructor page in the provided primary stage. Creates the UI layout with various navigation buttons and displays welcome message.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - The primary stage where the scene will be displayed
      databaseHelper - Helper class for database operations
      user - The currently logged in instructor user

    • openQandAPage

      private void openQandAPage(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Opens the QandA Page in the same window, replacing the current view. Sets up the QandAPage with the current user and handles window close events.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - The primary stage to display the QandA page

    • openDirectMessagePage

      private void openDirectMessagePage(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Opens the Direct Message Page in the same window, replacing the current view. Sets up the DirectMessage interface with the current user and handles window close events.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - The primary stage to display the direct message page
